nodes.text: The Imperial crest, also known as the Imperial insignia, or the Imperial logo, was the six-spoked symbol of Sheev Palpatine's Galactic Empire. An adaptation of the Galactic Republic's eight-spoked roundel, the Empire's omnipresent sigil adorned many things Imperial, from military uniforms and starships to flags and propaganda posters.

The Imperial insignia was designed by John Mollo, who was the costume designer for Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. In the Q&A feature of the 98th issue of Star Wars Insider magazine, Mollo revealed that he based the Imperial insignia on shapes used in 18th century fortifications.
